languages.text: "Но каково бы ни было оно, страшное и всемогущее — мы готовы встретиться с ним. Восстать против него. Пусть даже мы сгинем — это будет жертва ради искупления".
"But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."
languages.original_text: "Но каково бы ни было оно, страшное и всемогущее — мы готовы встретиться с ним. Восстать против него. Пусть даже мы сгинем — это будет жертва ради искупления".

traits.locale_text: "But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."
"But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."
"But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."
"But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."
"But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."

languages.text: 「しかし、いかにそれが恐ろしく、あるいは全能だったとして、我々はそれに向き合う準備ができている。立ち向かうのだ。それが我々を破滅させようとも、それは贖罪のための犠牲となるだろう」
languages.original_text: "But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、いかにそれが恐ろしく、あるいは全能だったとして、我々はそれに向き合う準備ができている。立ち向かうのだ。それが我々を破滅させようとも、それは贖罪のための犠牲となるだろう」

languages.text: “但无论它多么可怕，多么强大，我们都做好了面对它、反抗它的准备。即便我们被它毁灭，那也只不过是救赎的代价而已。”
languages.original_text: "But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."

traits.locale_text: “但无论它多么可怕，多么强大，我们都做好了面对它、反抗它的准备。即便我们被它毁灭，那也只不过是救赎的代价而已。”

languages.text: "Doch so ängstigend oder allmächtig es auch sein mag, wir werden bereit sein, ihm gegenüberzutreten. Uns gegen es zu erheben. Selbst, wenn es uns vernichtet, wird das ein Opfer um der Erlösung willen sein."
languages.original_text: "But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."

traits.locale_text: "Doch so ängstigend oder allmächtig es auch sein mag, wir werden bereit sein, ihm gegenüberzutreten. Uns gegen es zu erheben. Selbst, wenn es uns vernichtet, wird das ein Opfer um der Erlösung willen sein."

languages.text: « Mais aussi effrayante ou toute-puissante qu'elle puisse paraître, nous sommes prêts à l'affronter, à nous dresser contre elle. Et même si elle nous terrasse, notre sacrifice assurera notre salut. »
languages.original_text: "But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."

traits.locale_text: « Mais aussi effrayante ou toute-puissante qu'elle puisse paraître, nous sommes prêts à l'affronter, à nous dresser contre elle. Et même si elle nous terrasse, notre sacrifice assurera notre salut. »

languages.text: «Pero por temible o todopoderosa que sea, estamos listos para afrontarla. Nos alzaremos contra ella. Y aunque nos destruya, haremos el sacrificio en aras de la redención».
languages.original_text: "But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."

traits.locale_text: «Pero por temible o todopoderosa que sea, estamos listos para afrontarla. Nos alzaremos contra ella. Y aunque nos destruya, haremos el sacrificio en aras de la redención».

languages.text: "Ancak ne kadar korkunç ya da kudretli olduğu fark etmez, onunla yüzleşmeye hazırız. Ona karşı çıkacağız. Bizi yok etse dahi kefaretimizi ödemek için fedakârlık yapacağız."
languages.original_text: "But however frightening or all-powerful it may be, we are ready to face it. Rise against it. Even if it destroys us, it will be a sacrifice for the sake of redemption."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak ne kadar korkunç ya da kudretli olduğu fark etmez, onunla yüzleşmeye hazırız. Ona karşı çıkacağız. Bizi yok etse dahi kefaretimizi ödemek için fedakârlık yapacağız."
